block.p: PARNELL-Nick, 74 years. Of 104 East 37th Street, New York City, on September 9. Professional dancer. Brother of John Pantazelos of Lynn, MA, Louis Pantazelos of Peabody, MA, and the late Sela Pantazelos and Sylvia Zambouras. Uncle of many. Funeral from the Solimine, Landergan and Rhodes Funeral Home, 67 Ocean Street (Rt. 1A) Lynn on Friday at 9:00 AM followed by funeral services in St. George Greek Orthodox Church, So. Common Street, Lynn, MA at 10:00 AM. Burial is in Pine Grove Cemetery, Lynn, MA. Relatives and friends are respectfully invited. Visitation Friday at 9:00 AM. Directions and guest book at www.legacy.com.
